items.sentence: Almost all the passenger on the bus were asleep when the accident happened.
The bear left no stone unturned in his search for fat bugs under the rocks.
Bear in mind that that school is an integrated junior high and high school.
The police had the witness explain in detail how the accident had happened.
Yesterday I was caught in a shower on my way home from walking in the park.
Those approaching retirement age have the choice of working or not working.
The good thing about this electronic dictionary is that it's easy to carry.
This looks and smells like orange juice, but it isn't. I wonder what it is.
Tom cried on Mary's shoulder while he told her how Alice broke up with him.
I'm pretty sure that I've left the keys to my office in my raincoat pocket.
